snippet: The deal, which puts new episodes on BET eight days after their initial showing, demonstrates that show owners are willing to consider new models for syndication.
abstract: Cable channel BET will televise episodes of hit ABC drama Scandal just eight days after they premiere on ABC, under an unusual syndication deal.
lead_paragraph: The deal, which puts new episodes on BET eight days after their initial showing, demonstrates that show owners are willing to consider new models for syndication.

headline.main: ABC’s ‘Scandal’ to Be Quickly Syndicated on BET
